short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI based addon which generates competitive exam questions based on content copied from a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Introducing an innovative AI addon designed to generate competitive exam questions specifically tailored for UPSC exams. This addon utilizes advanced AI technology to analyze and extract relevant content from webpages, transforming it into challenging and comprehensive exam questions. With its sophisticated algorithms, this addon ensures that the generated questions cover a wide range of topics and are of the caliber expected in UPSC examinations. Experience the power of AI in revolutionizing exam preparation with this cutting-edge addon."
